mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ADM_BANNER_INFO A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.BNR_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT A.BNR_ID , A.BNR_TITLE , TO_CHAR(A.EXPO_BGN_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EXPO_BGN_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.EXPO_END_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EXPO_END_DTTM , A.PAR_ROW_POS , A.ROW_POS , A.LINK_URL , A.SORT_SEQ , A.DEL_YN , A.REGR_ID , A.UPDR_ID FROM ADM_BANNER_INFO A WHERE A.BNR_ID = #{bnrId}

SELECT BNR_ID ,APND_FILE_SEQ ,APND_FILE_SZ ,APND_FILE_ORGN ,APND_FILE_NAME ,APND_FILE_PATH ,DEL_YN FROM ADM_BANNER_APND_FILE B WHERE BNR_ID = #{bnrId}
AND APND_FILE_SEQ = #{apndFileSeq}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LPAD( NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(BNR_ID)) ,0)+1 , '6', '0') BNR_ID FROM ADM_BANNER_INFO
INSERT INTO ADM_BANNER_INFO ( BNR_ID ,BNR_TITLE ,EXPO_BGN_DTTM ,EXPO_END_DTTM ,PAR_ROW_POS ,ROW_POS ,LINK_URL ,SORT_SEQ ,DEL_YN ,REGR_ID ,REG_DTTM ,UPDR_ID ,UPD_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{bnrId} ,#{bnrTitle} ,TO_DATE(#{expoBgnDttm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,TO_DATE(#{expoEndDttm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,#{parRowPos} ,#{rowPos} ,#{linkUrl} ,#{sortSeq} ,#{delYn} ,#{regrId} ,SYSDATE ,#{updrId} ,SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE ADM_BANNER_INFO SET BNR_TITLE = #{bnrTitle} , EXPO_BGN_DTTM = TO_DATE(#{expoBgnDttm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , EXPO_END_DTTM = TO_DATE(#{expoEndDttm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , PAR_ROW_POS = #{parRowPos} , ROW_POS = #{rowPos} , LINK_URL = #{linkUrl} , SORT_SEQ = #{sortSeq} , UPDR_ID = #{updrId} , UPD_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE BNR_ID = #{bnrId}
